mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(S_COL) FROM SEATS S, SEAT_CATEGORY SCT WHERE SCT.SCT_IDX = S.SCT_IDX AND SCT.ROOMNUM = #{roomnum} AND S.BR_IDX = #{br_idx} ORDER BY S.S_IDX
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOOKING (bk_idx, id, s_idx, start_time, end_time, bk_regdate, booknum, price) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(bk_idx),0)+1 FROM BOOKING), #{id}, #{s_idx}, to_date(#{start_time}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), to_date(#{end_time},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), SYSDATE, #{booknum}, #{price})
mapper.select: SELECT S_IDX FROM SEATS WHERE S_COL = #{s_col} AND BR_IDX = #{br_idx}
SELECT CB_IDX FROM CABINET WHERE BR_IDX = #{br_idx} AND CB_IDX NOT IN (SELECT CB_IDX FROM CABINET_VIEW WHERE BR_IDX = #{br_idx}) ORDER BY CB_IDX
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOOKING_CB (CKB_IDX, ID, START_DATE, END_DATE, CB_IDX, CKB_REGDATE) VALUES ((select NVL(MAX(ckb_idx),0)+1 from booking_cb), #{id}, to_date(#{start_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), to_date(#{end_date},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), #{cb_idx}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT distinct sv.*, B.ID, B.START_TIME, B.END_TIME, B.BK_REGDATE, B.BOOKNUM FROM SEATS_VIEW SV, BOOKING B WHERE sv.s_idx = B.S_IDX AND id=#{id} and to_char(b.bk_regdate, 'YYYYMMDD') = to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD')
